lead_paragraph: Liverpool defender Mamadou Sakho does not have to regain the trust of manager Juergen Klopp following a turbulent few months at Anfield although there will be no quick return to the first team for the France international.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool's Sakho Unlikely to Make Quick Return, Says Klopp
headline.main: Liverpool's Sakho Unlikely to Make Quick Return, Says Klopp

snippet: Liverpool defender Mamadou Sakho does not have to regain the trust of manager Juergen Klopp following a turbulent few months at Anfield although there will be no quick return to the first team for the France international....
